catchphrase.heading: Win a pick.
catchphrase.context:
Make pick smart. Take Advantage. Rank up. 
Win your pick and win the game. 
Only in WinPick, the best prediction solution of LoL.

HowItWorks.heading: How it works
HowItWorks.context: WinPick is a prediction solution for League of Legends.

Demo.heading: Demo
Demo.context: Try our demo solution by entering champion name.

enterprise.heading: Enterprise
context: Fine-tuning and Personal fitting service provided.

AboutUs.heading: About Us
AboutUs.context: We are a team of people who are passionate about League of Legends and Machine Learning. We are trying to make a better predictions of League of Legends games.

ContactUs.heading: Contact Us
context: If you have any questions, please contact us by email. We will reply as soon as possible.
